abilities.desc: After an effect Pushes you, you may Pull yourself up to 2 towards the source of that Push.
At the end of every turn, you may Move 1, then you deal 1 damage to an enemy within range.
abilities.trigger: at the end of every turn

actions.name: Suddenly...
actions.desc:
Teleport into an empty space adjacent to someone who is alone, then if they are an enemy, you deal 1 damage to them.
Someone is alone if nobody is adjacent to them.
